author: Peter Grant
title: Howard Hughes Corp. Thrives as Ackman Trims His Holdings
text:
Howard Hughes Corp., the master-planned community developer chaired by hedge-fund manager William Ackman, reported strong earnings this week thanks partly to rising prices for developed land in the Houston and Las Vegas regions.
The report was Howard Hughesâ€™s first earnings release since Mr. Ackman surprised Wall Street in January by announcing plans to reduce the stake in the Dallas-based company held by his Pershing Square funds to 17.6% from about 23%.
